alert.note: Alert for Cass; Fulton; Kosciusko; Miami; Wabash (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 1:51AM EDT until July 29 at 2:45AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Wabash County in north central Indiana... Fulton County in north central Indiana... Southern Kosciusko County in north central Indiana... Northeastern Cass County in north central Indiana... Northwestern Miami County in north central Indiana... * Until 245 AM EDT. * At 151 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Culver to near Royal Center, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wabash, Rochester, North Manchester, Akron, Mentone, Mexico, Silver Lake, Erie, Denver, Roann, Claypool, Fulton, Macy, Burket, Sidney, Richvalley, Nyena Lake, Deedsville, Beaver Dam Lake, and Hoover. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
